java.promptHint:
- The file is saved as 'Test.java' and executed with 'java Test'.
- The public class name MUST be exactly 'Test' to match the filename.
- Do NOT use any other public class name (e.g. 'Main', 'Solution'). Only 'Test' is allowed.
- All code must be written inside the single 'Test' class.
- Non-public helper classes may be defined in the same file.

rust.promptHint:
- The code is compiled as a single file 'test.rs' with 'rustc' directly (not Cargo).
- Do NOT use 'extern crate' or any external crates; only the Rust standard library is available.

kotlin.promptHint:
- The code is compiled as a single file 'test.kt' and run as a JAR.
- Define the entry point as a top-level 'fun main()' function (not inside a class).
- Do NOT split code across multiple files or use multi-file project structures.
- External dependencies (Gradle/Maven) are not available; use only the Kotlin standard library.
